generatedTitle: why do plankton live near the surface

extractFactDictList.question: How many main groups can plankton be divided into?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Plankton can be divided into two main groups: phytoplankton, which are single-celled plants, and zooplankton, which are single-celled animals.

extractFactDictList.question: How many reasons do plankton stay near the surface?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One reason why plankton stay near the surface is because the sunlight is more intense at the surface, which allows phytoplankton to carry out photosynthesis more efficiently.
